titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H. R. 2782) to authorize appropriations to the National Aeronautics and Space Administration for research and development; space flight, control and data communications; construction of facilities; and research and program management; and for other purposes.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-207.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 7/8/1987--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2782 (National Aeronautics and Space Administration funding).
